attributes.action: Ban face coverings in all UK Public places, unless they are for Work Safety.
attributes.additional_details: Safety, enable facial identificacion to catch wanted criminals and curb Identity Theft.
attributes.background:
Ban all face coverings in all Public Places, unless they are deemed fit for Health Reasons or Work Safety Standards, as proposed facial identificacion would be imposible.
This is now a practice in several countries, and the UK should follow suit.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/723131
